about_the_game:
「In 1946, a full-scale counteroffensive operation was launched against the Japanese army, which has vast Pacific Ocean areas.
Shoot the enemy fleet, break in the iron-clad Pacific defense line and Show the American spirit.」

this Game Is A top-down 2d Shooter

Features


Simple gameplay that follows the good old 2D shooting game system
Three types of aircraft can be selected
Each has features such as wide range type, centralized type, and high power type.
Your ship is usually with a shot In addition, it has an emergency bomb and a support aircraft attack,

Support aircraft attacks can be participated in the attack by using the Charge gauge.
Support machines are also characterized by wide-range type, centralized type, and high-power type.
By combining it with your own attack, you can make more efficient attacks.


※This is a trial version that can be played up to stage 2.
Before purchasing the full version, please make sure that the trial version runs smoothly.

Controller&Keyboard Settings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: core i7 3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX750ti
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: cherry blossom fleet　is a 2D shooting game set in the Japanese Navy of World War II.
